DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety multiple dos IV MNTX normal healthy adult .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Must male nonpregnant female volunteer 2 . Must 18 65 yr age 3 . Must significant active disease state 1 . History current evidence disease ( cardiovascular , respiratory , endocrine , renal , hepatic , hematological , psychiatric ) 2 . Illicit drug user 3 . Subjects receive experimental new drug past 30 day 4 . Subjects laboratory finding outside normal limit
